org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface ApplicationAPI


  • public interface ApplicationAPI
    This API allows to list and manage Bonita Living Applications (Application).
    Since:
    6.4
    Author:
    Elias Ricken de Medeiros
    See Also:
    Application

    • Method Detail

      • createApplication

        Application createApplication(ApplicationCreator applicationCreator)
                              throws AlreadyExistsException,
                                     CreationException
        Creates a new Application based on the supplied ApplicationCreator
        Parameters:
        applicationCreator - creator describing characteristics of application to be created
        Returns:
        the created Application
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - if an application already exists with the same name
        CreationException - if an error occurs during the creation
        See Also:
        Application, ApplicationCreator

      • getApplication

        Application getApplication(long applicationId)
                           throws ApplicationNotFoundException
        Retrieves an Application from its identifier.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - the application identifier
        Returns:
        an Application from its identifier.
        Throws:
        ApplicationNotFoundException - if no application is found for the given identifier
        See Also:
        Application

      • deleteApplication

        void deleteApplication(long applicationId)
                       throws DeletionException
        Deletes an Application by its identifier. All related ApplicationPages and ApplicationMenus will be automatically deleted.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - the Application identifier
        Throws:
        DeletionException - if an error occurs during the deletion
        See Also:
        Application, ApplicationPage, ApplicationMenu

      • updateApplication

        Application updateApplication(long applicationId,
                            ApplicationUpdater updater)
                              throws ApplicationNotFoundException,
                                     UpdateException,
                                     AlreadyExistsException
        Updates an Application based on the information supplied by the ApplicationUpdater
        Parameters:
        applicationId - a long representing the application identifier
        updater - an ApplicationUpdater describing the fields to be updated.
        Returns:
        the Application as it is after the update.
        Throws:
        ApplicationNotFoundException - if no Application is found for the given id
        AlreadyExistsException - if another Application already exists with the new name value
        UpdateException - if an error occurs during the update
        See Also:
        Application, ApplicationUpdater

      • searchApplications

        SearchResult<Application> searchApplications(SearchOptions searchOptions)
                                             throws SearchException
        Searches for Applications with specific search criteria. Use ApplicationSearchDescriptor to know the available filters.
        Parameters:
        searchOptions - the search criteria. See SearchOptions for details.
        Returns:
        a SearchResult containing the number and the list of applications matching the search criteria.
        Throws:
        SearchException - if an error occurs during search
        See Also:
        Application, ApplicationSearchDescriptor, SearchOptions, SearchResult

      • createApplicationPage

        ApplicationPage createApplicationPage(long applicationId,
                                    long pageId,
                                    String token)
                                      throws AlreadyExistsException,
                                             CreationException,
                                             ApplicationNotFoundException
        Creates an ApplicationPage
        Parameters:
        applicationId - the identifier of the Application to which the Page will be associated
        pageId - the identifier of Page to be associated to the Application
        token - the token that this Page will take in this ApplicationPage. The token must be unique for a given application and should contain only alpha numeric characters and the following special characters '-', '.', '_' or '~'. In addition, the following words are reserved key words and cannot be used as token: 'api', 'content', 'theme'.
        Returns:
        the created ApplicationPage
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - if the token is already used by another ApplicationPage on this Application
        CreationException - if an error occurs during the creation
        ApplicationNotFoundException - if the referenced application does not exist.
        See Also:
        ApplicationPage, Application, Page

      • getApplicationPage

        ApplicationPage getApplicationPage(String applicationToken,
                                 String applicationPageToken)
                                   throws ApplicationPageNotFoundException
        Retrieves the ApplicationPage for the given Application token and ApplicationPage token
        Parameters:
        applicationToken - the Application name
        applicationPageToken - the ApplicationPage token
        Returns:
        the ApplicationPage for the given Application token and ApplicationPage token
        Throws:
        ApplicationPageNotFoundException - if no ApplicationPage is found for the given Application token and ApplicationPage token
        See Also:
        ApplicationPage

      • searchApplicationPages

        SearchResult<ApplicationPage> searchApplicationPages(SearchOptions searchOptions)
                                                     throws SearchException
        Searches for ApplicationPages with specific search criteria.
        Parameters:
        searchOptions - the search criteria. See SearchOptions for details. Use ApplicationPageSearchDescriptor to know the available filters.
        Returns:
        a SearchResult containing the number and the list of org.bonitasoft.engine.business.application.ApplicationPageSearchDescriptors matching the search criteria.
        Throws:
        SearchException - if an error occurs during the search execution
        See Also:
        ApplicationPage, ApplicationPageSearchDescriptor, SearchOptions, SearchResult

                            throws UpdateException,

      • createApplicationMenu

        ApplicationMenu createApplicationMenu(ApplicationMenuCreator applicationMenuCreator)
                                      throws CreationException
        Creates a ApplicationMenu based on the supplied ApplicationMenuCreator. The new created ApplicationMenu will be ordered at the last position of its level with an auto generated index.
        Parameters:
        applicationMenuCreator - creator describing the characteristics of the ApplicationMenu to be created
        Returns:
        the created ApplicationMenu
        Throws:
        CreationException - if an error occurs during the creation
        See Also:
        ApplicationMenu, ApplicationMenuCreator

      • updateApplicationMenu

        ApplicationMenu updateApplicationMenu(long applicationMenuId,
                                    ApplicationMenuUpdater updater)
                                      throws ApplicationMenuNotFoundException,
                                             UpdateException
        Updates an ApplicationMenu based on the information supplied by the ApplicationMenuUpdater.

        When the ApplicationMenu index is updated all other ApplicationMenus in the same level will have indexes automatically updated in order to keep indexes coherency. For instance, when an ApplicationMenu is moved from index 4 to index 2, the ApplicationMenu previously at index 2 will be moved to index 3 and the ApplicationMenu previously at index 3 will be moved to index 4.

        Parameters:
        applicationMenuId - the ApplicationMenu identifier
        updater - the ApplicationMenuUpdater describing the fields to be updated.
        Returns:
        the ApplicationMenu up to date
        Throws:
        ApplicationMenuNotFoundException - if no ApplicationMenu is found for the given identifier
        UpdateException - if an exception occurs during the update
        See Also:
        ApplicationMenu, ApplicationMenuUpdater

      • getApplicationMenu

        ApplicationMenu getApplicationMenu(long applicationMenuId)
                                   throws ApplicationMenuNotFoundException
        Retrieves the ApplicationMenu from its identifier
        Parameters:
        applicationMenuId - the ApplicationMenu menu identifier
        Returns:
        the ApplicationMenu from its identifier
        Throws:
        ApplicationMenuNotFoundException - if no ApplicationMenu is found for the given identifier
        See Also:
        ApplicationMenu

      • deleteApplicationMenu

        void deleteApplicationMenu(long applicationMenuId)
                           throws DeletionException
        Deletes an ApplicationMenu by its identifier. All children ApplicationMenu will be automatically deleted.

        When an ApplicationMenu is deleted all others ApplicationMenus having index greater than the index of deleted ApplicationMenu in the same level will be automatically updated in order to keep indexes coherency.

        Parameters:
        applicationMenuId - the ApplicationMenu identifier
        Throws:
        DeletionException - if an error occurs during the deletion
        See Also:
        ApplicationMenu

      • searchApplicationMenus

        SearchResult<ApplicationMenu> searchApplicationMenus(SearchOptions searchOptions)
                                                     throws SearchException
        Searches for ApplicationMenus with specific search criteria.
        Parameters:
        searchOptions - the search criteria. See SearchOptions for details. Use ApplicationMenuSearchDescriptor to know the available filters
        Returns:
        a SearchResult containing the number and the list of ApplicationMenus matching the search criteria.
        Throws:
        SearchException - if an error occurs during search
        See Also:
        ApplicationMenu, SearchOptions, ApplicationMenuSearchDescriptor, SearchResult

      • getAllPagesForProfile

        List<String> getAllPagesForProfile(long profileId)
        Return all pages names that can be accessed by the profile through applications. The portal use this method to calculate all permissions for a user.
        Parameters:
        profileId - the id of the profile
        Returns:
        list of page name accessible by the profile through applications

      • exportApplications

        byte[] exportApplications(long... applicationIds)
                          throws ExportException
        Exports the Applications which identifier is in applicationIds
        Parameters:
        applicationIds - the identifiers of Applications to be exported
        Returns:
        a byte array representing the content of XML file containing the exported Applications
        Throws:
        ExportException - if an exception occurs during the export.
        See Also:
        Application

      • importApplications

        List<ImportStatus> importApplications(byte[] xmlContent,
                                    ApplicationImportPolicy policy)
                                      throws ImportException,
                                             AlreadyExistsException
        Imports Applications based on a XML file content.

        Before importing Applications ensure that all Profiles referenced by Applications and all Pages referenced by ApplicationPages are available.

        • When the Profile does not exist the Application will be imported, but no Profile will be associated to it. An ImportError will be added to the ImportStatus related to this Application.
        • When a Page does not exist the related ApplicationPage and ApplicationMenus pointing to this ApplicationPage will not be created. An ImportError will be added to the ImportStatus related to the Application containing this ApplicationPage.

        Parameters:
        xmlContent - a byte array representing the content of XML file containing the applications to be imported.
        policy - the ApplicationImportPolicy used to execute the import
        Returns:
        a List of ImportStatus representing the ImportStatus for each imported Application
        Throws:
        ImportException - if an error occurs during the import
        AlreadyExistsException - if one of applications being imported already exists and the policy ApplicationImportPolicy.FAIL_ON_DUPLICATES is used
        See Also:
        Application, ApplicationImportPolicy, ImportStatus, ImportError, ApplicationPage, ApplicationMenu, Profile, Page
